attributes.action: Introduce a Wealth Tax on assets worth over £10million
attributes.additional_details:
The British Government needs to introduce a Wealth Tax on assets over £10 Million to raise funds for public services and prevent the countries wealth from being absorbed by people who leech money from the working people of this country. 
There IS a solution to the cost of living crisis. There IS a way of raising public funds without harming the good working people of this country. WE THE PEOPLE are sick and tired of funding vanity for those who cause wealth inequality. TAX WEALTH NOT WORK
attributes.background: Our living standards fall, cost of living rises as the wealthiest members of society hoard all of the money. WE THE WORKING PEOPLE should NOT be paying for billionaires to exist. WE THE WORKING PEOPLE should be able to live comfortably with money we earn. Make it fair, tax wealth  not work

rejection.details:
Implement a 2% wealth tax on individuals with net assets exceeding £10 million
